name: Tama Tama Paradise
description:
Paradise Island Tech thanks you for joining the S.I.N.A project as our new lab technician!

Your new job in the S.I.N.A project is to take care of the magical social creatures named Tamas. Tamas have intelligence - according to our previous study, they understand the concept of "friend", "enemy", "help", "attack", "warm" and "freedom".

They are also sensitive to the temperature and pressure of the petri dish where they live. You can change the two parameters - temperature and pressure - to make Tamas react differently.

The lab will send you tasks, and you will receive a report of your job performance after you finish all of the tasks.

Good luck!

Luna

Research assistant, Paradise Island
